com.ibm.cloud.objectstorage.auth.json

Class JsonConfigFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.cloud.objectstorage.auth.json.JsonConfigFile

  • public class JsonConfigFile
extends Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JsonConfigFile()
      Loads the IBM credentials file from the default location (~/.bluemix/cos_credentials) or from an alternate location if IBM_CREDENTIAL_JSON_FILE is set.
      JsonConfigFile(File file)
      Loads the IBM credentials from the file.
      JsonConfigFile(String filePath)
      Loads the IBM credentials from the file.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AWSCredentials getCredentials()
      Returns the IBM credentials.
      void refresh()
      Reread data from disk.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • JsonConfigFile

        public JsonConfigFile()
               throws SdkClientException
        Loads the IBM credentials file from the default location (~/.bluemix/cos_credentials) or from an alternate location if IBM_CREDENTIAL_JSON_FILE is set.
        Throws:
        SdkClientException

      • JsonConfigFile

        public JsonConfigFile(String filePath)
        Loads the IBM credentials from the file. The path of the file is specified as a parameter to the constructor.

      • JsonConfigFile

        public JsonConfigFile(File file)
               throws SdkClientException
        Loads the IBM credentials from the file. The reference to the file is specified as a parameter to the constructor.
        Throws:
        SdkClientException

    • Method Detail

      • getCredentials

        public AWSCredentials getCredentials()
        Returns the IBM credentials.

        Reread data from disk.
